00026 #ifndef __OgrePagingLandScapePoolSet_H__
00027 #define __OgrePagingLandScapePoolSet_H__
00028 
00029 #include <list>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre 
00034 {
00037         template <class T> class PoolSet 
00038         {
00039         protected:
00040 
00041                 typedef std::list<T*> ActivePoolableList;
00042                 typedef std::list<T*> FreePoolableList;
00043                 typedef std::vector<T*> PoolablePool;
00044 
00045         public:
00046 
00056                 PoolSet(unsigned int poolSize = 0,  bool autoExtendPool = true):
00057                                 mAutoExtendPool(autoExtendPool),
00058                                 mAutoExtendFactor(2.0f),
00059                                 mPoolSize(poolSize)
00060                   {
00061                           assert (mFreePoolables.empty());
00062                           assert (mActivePoolables.empty());
00063                           assert (mPoolablePool.empty());
00064 
00065                           setPoolSize(poolSize);
00066                   }
00070                   virtual ~PoolSet() 
00071                   {
00072                           assert (mPoolSize == 0 && mPoolablePool.empty());
00073                   }
00077                   void deletePool() 
00078                   {
00079                           // Free pool items
00080                           for (typename PoolablePool::iterator i = mPoolablePool.begin(); 
00081                                   i != mPoolablePool.end(); ++i)
00082                           {   
00083                                   deallocate (*i);
00084                           }
00085                           mPoolablePool.clear();
00086                           mFreePoolables.clear();
00087                           mActivePoolables.clear();
00088                           mPoolSize = 0;
00089                   }
00103                   T* getPoolable() 
00104                   {
00105                           if (mFreePoolables.empty())
00106                           {
00107                                   if (mAutoExtendPool)
00108                                   {
00109                                           autoExtend ();   
00110                                   }
00111                                   else
00112                                   {
00113                                           return 0;
00114                                   }
00115                           }
00116                           // Get a new Object
00117                           T* newPoolable = mFreePoolables.front();
00118                           mFreePoolables.pop_front();
00119                           mActivePoolables.push_back(newPoolable); 
00120 
00121                           return newPoolable;
00122                   }
00123                   /*
00124                   Extend the pool Size by a mAutoExtendFactor factor (default 2.0f)
00125                   */
00126                   void autoExtend()
00127                   {
00128                           unsigned int newSize = (unsigned int)(mPoolSize * mAutoExtendFactor);
00129                           if (newSize <= mPoolSize)
00130                                   newSize = mPoolSize + 1;
00131                           setPoolSize (newSize);
00132                   }
00133                   /*
00134                   Extend the pool Size by this factor (default is 2.0f)
00135                   */
00136                   void setExtendFactor(const float factor)
00137                   {
00138                           assert(factor >= 1.0f);// otherwise you'll make it smaller
00139                           mAutoExtendFactor = factor;
00140                   }
00145                   void removePoolable(T * const pPoolable)
00146                   {
00147                           mActivePoolables.remove (pPoolable);
00148                           mFreePoolables.push_back (pPoolable);
00149                   }
00152                   size_t getActivePoolablesSize(void) const
00153                   {
00154                           return static_cast< size_t >(mActivePoolables.size());
00155                   }
00156                   ActivePoolableList &getActivePoolables(void) 
00157                   {
00158                           return mActivePoolables;
00159                   }
00173                   void setAutoextend(bool autoextend)
00174                   {
00175                           mAutoExtendPool = autoextend;
00176                   }
00181                   bool getAutoextend(void) const
00182                   {
00183                           return mAutoExtendPool;
00184                   }
00195                   void setPoolSize(const unsigned int size)
00196                   {
00197                           // Never shrink below size()
00198                           const size_t currSize = mPoolablePool.size();
00199 
00200                           if(currSize < size)
00201                           {
00202                                   increasePool(size);
00203                                   for (size_t i = currSize; i < size; ++i)
00204                                   {
00205                                           // Add new items to the queue
00206                                           mFreePoolables.push_back (mPoolablePool[i]);
00207                                   }
00208                                   mPoolSize = size;
00209                           }
00210                   }
00217                   unsigned int getPoolSize(void) const
00218                   {
00219                           return static_cast< unsigned int >(mPoolablePool.size());
00220                   }
00223                   void clear()
00224                   {
00225                           // Insert actives into free list
00226                           mFreePoolables.insert(mFreePoolables.end(), mActivePoolables.begin(), mActivePoolables.end());
00227 
00228                           // Remove all active instances
00229                           mActivePoolables.clear(); 
00230                   }
00231 
00232         protected:
00241                 ActivePoolableList mActivePoolables;
00249                 FreePoolableList mFreePoolables;
00254                 PoolablePool mPoolablePool;
00256                 unsigned int mPoolSize;
00258                 bool mAutoExtendPool;
00259                 // by how much we will auto extend current pool
00260                 Real mAutoExtendFactor;
00261 
00263                 void increasePool(unsigned int size)
00264                 {
00265                         assert (size > 0);
00266                         const size_t oldSize = mPoolablePool.size();
00267 
00268                         // Increase size
00269                         mPoolablePool.reserve(size);
00270                         mPoolablePool.resize(size);
00271 
00272                         // Create new queries
00273                         for (size_t i = oldSize; i < size; ++i)
00274                                 mPoolablePool[i] = allocate();
00275                 }
00276         protected :
00277                 virtual T* allocate() = 0;
00278                 virtual void deallocate(T* p) = 0;
00279 
00280         };
00281 
00282 }
00283 
00284 #endif//__OgrePagingLandScapePoolSet_H__
